title: Samples, ca. 1910
dimensions:
a. Warp: 27.5 cm [11"] Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 24 cm [9.5"]   Cut both sides.
b. Warp: 21.5 cm [8.5"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 25 cm [10"]  Cut both sides.
c. Warp: 18.5 cm [7 1/4"] Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 24 cm [9.5"] Cut both sides.
creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott
description:
a. Red ground with red, yellow and green floral design.
b. Green ground with green, yellow,and orange floral design.
c. Pink ground with pink, yellow and green floral design.
